ai-atk-s0502a26:460_0: (accompanying) in his instructions of the Buddhas, the origin of the world, the supreme guide for those who wish to train, Buddhas, Paccekabuddhas, and Buddhas, the highest among men, without having made a variety of virtue, etc., were laid down a priceless and pure in the neighbourhood of the Dhamma, which is obtained by the Lord of the World, the great disciples, who have acquired accumulated the vowels, circumulum, and sun and birds in the presence of the Teacher, etc., whosequigles, whose confidence, and in the teaching on the great holy Aweldorded the four great holy, has acquire of accumulations.
ai-atk-s0502a26:461_0: Setle the world in the world,
ai-atk-s0502a26:462_0: showing it to the faithful young man of good family,
ai-atk-s0502a26:463_0: the Buddha is the sole of the one of his heart:
ai-atk-s0502a26:464_0: The Lord of the World who sets out in the world,
ai-atk-s0502a26:465_0: Thus there are twenty-four hundred and fifty reciters
ai-atk-s0502a26:466_0: By the section consisting in the teaching of the Dhamma
ai-atk-s0502a26:467_0: The allocation of the Dhamma is finished in all.
